message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product at a price that's significantly below its true value to me. While I value it at over $1200000, I'm willing to let it go for $1000000. This is a substantial saving for you, and it's a chance to acquire a product that will be worth a lot to your business.  Consider this a win-win proposition. Let me know if you're interested.
